title: Housing finance companies may miss out on festive demand
description: Housing finance companies are anticipating a delay in the festive season demand surge due to pending government guidelines on the PMAY and Affordable Housing Refinance Scheme. The PMAY subsidy aims to provide ₹1.80 lakh for home loans up to ₹25 lakh, while the refinance scheme offers a 5% interest rate for housing loans disbursed in the past year.
